Item ID3123

Shaikahan bones are dropped by The Shaikahan when it is killed, which requires a Karambwan paste-poisoned spear or hasta. Despite the examine text stating it glows with a yellow aura, its appearance remains akin to that of big bones.

Shaikahan bones give 25 Prayer experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways:

  • 75 XP when casting Sinister Offering.
  • 75 XP when offered at the Sacred Bone Burner after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
  • 87.5 XP when offered at a gilded altar with two burners lit or at the Chaos Temple.
  • 100 XP when offered at the Ectofuntus in the form of Shaikahan bonemeal.

'''Shaikahan bones''' are dropped by [[The Shaikahan]] when it is killed, which requires a [[Karambwan paste]]-poisoned [[spear]] or [[hasta]]. Despite the examine text stating it glows with a yellow aura, its appearance remains akin to that of big bones.

Shaikahan bones give 25 [[Prayer]] experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways: 
* 75 XP when casting [[Sinister Offering]].
* 75 XP when offered at the [[Sacred Bone Burner]] after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
* 87.5 XP when offered at a [[gilded altar]] with two burners lit or at the [[Chaos Temple (hut)|Chaos Temple]].
* 100 XP when offered at the [[Ectofuntus]] in the form of [[Shaikahan bonemeal]].
